policy.name: NGINX-GRPC
policy.description: Policy with gRPC response page enabled for blocking gRPC requests

response-pages.responseHeader:
HTTP/1.1 403 FORBIDDEN
Content-Type: application/grpc+proto
Grpc-status: 7
Grpc-message: Blocked by NGINX App Protect, Your support ID is <%TS.request.ID()%>
Support-ID: <%TS.request.ID()%>
Cache-Control: no-cache
Pragma: no-cache
Connection: close
